item.title: Demand Elasticity Estimation with DoubleML
item.description: In this example, we will demonstrate the use of the DoubleML package in a real-data industry example: Estimation of price elasticity of demand. This notebook is based on a blogpost by Lars Roemheld (Roemheld, 2021) with code and preprocessed data being available from GitHub. The original data file is made available as a public domain (CC0 1.0 Universal) data set and shared on kaggle. It contains data on sales from an online retailer in the period of December 2010 until December 2011.
